title: [Updated] Investigation of Special Sunny Sunday Pet Box
content: We are currently investigating the issues relating to the Special Sunny Sunday Pet Box from the Week 6 - August 27th, 2023 Sunny Sunday Event.

title: v.244 Punch King Palooza Patch Notes
content: Click here to read the patch notes for v.244 Punch King Palooza

title: Cash Shop Update for August 30
content: Royal Styles, School Is My Hideout Packages, Permanent Friendship Rings, 90-Day Pets, and more!

title: [Completed] Scheduled Game Update - August 30, 2023
content: The maintenance has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 9 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client! Thank you for your patience.

title: Last Day for the Marvel Machine!
content: Don't miss out, because the Marvel Machine closes up shop on Sunday, August 27 at 11:59 PM PDT!

title: Important Changes to Second Pendant Slot
content: Learn about upcoming changes to MapleStory's second pendant slot.
